Class ItemDocumentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.helpers.AbstractDataObjectBuilder<T,O>

        • org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.helpers.ItemDocumentBuilder

  • public class ItemDocumentBuilder
extends EntityDocumentBuilder<ItemDocumentBuilder,ItemDocument>
    Builder class to construct ItemDocument objects.
    Author:
    Markus Kroetzsch
